mapper.insert: insert into trainer_matching_board (board_title, trainer_id, expiration_time, avail_consult_weeks, avail_consult_time, trainer_zipcode, trainer_addr, trainer_addrdetail, board_content) values (#{boardTitle}, #{trainerId}, #{expirationTime}, #{availConsultWeeks}, #{availConsultTime}, #{trainerZipcode}, #{trainerAddr}, #{trainerAddrdetail}, #{boardContent})
mapper.select:
select * from trainer_matching_board where
0 < board_num order by board_num desc limit #{startrow},#{amount}
select max(board_num) from trainer_matching_board where trainer_id=#{trainerId}
mapper.update: update trainer_matching_board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where board_num=#{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM trainer_matching_board where ((board_title like('%${keyword}%')) or (board_content like('%${keyword}%')) or (trainer_id like('%${keyword}%'))) order by board_num asc;
